Be able to determine the entry trigger & the exit.
Understand the importance to have a good profitable strategy, the biggest lie in trading & eliminate your worst enemy (emotions).

items.title: Costumer Research - The Ultimate Customer Research Guide

objectives_summary: Apply basic and advanced customer research techniques onto a real-life market environment problem
Understand and apply advanced customer research analysis methods in order to (for instance) convince a venture capitalists or business angel of a business idea
Know how to identify a market opportunity that could result in a profitable startup idea

items.title: Strategy Tool: Business Model Canvas, a 1-page business plan

items.headline: Learn how to plan out every piece of your business with the Business Model Canvas or the Lean Canvas.
objectives_summary: A system to identify all the vital pieces that make a business viable
Learn to critically evaluate the business and see if there is product market fit (if there is true demand)

items.title: Design Thinking Masterclass Bootcamp - Know Your Business

objectives_summary: The Design Thinking Process done the NEW WAY - solving the challenges of Today.

objectives_summary: A complete immersion in brainstorming

items.title: Platform Business & Strategy
items.headline: Adopt a network-centred view of your business and transform your firm's offerings into defensible platforms.
objectives_summary: Master the fundamentals of digital transformation via connected strategies and platforms and move beyond the often-used limitation to “uberization".
Evaluate platforms and their strategies in terms of their business model.
Discuss and develop products into defensible platforms.
